query.pigql: a=load "SUMMARY_OUTLET_VIEW";a = filter a by {{ row(Date_Year_Date_Month_14.selection, [0], ["min","max"]).asDateRange("date('Month_Year_Number_Year','Month_Year_Number_Month','Month_Year_Number_Day')") }} && {{ column(Country_21.selection, ["Country"]).asEquality("Country") }} && {{ column(City_24.selection, ["City"]).asEquality("City") }} && {{ column(Commune_45.selection, ["Commune"]).asEquality("Community") }} && {{ column(Customer_type_30.selection, ["Customer_Type"]).asEquality("Key_Customer_Type") }} && {{ column(Trade_Format_27.selection, ["Trade_Format"]).asEquality("Trade_Format") }} && {{ column(X4P_5P_6P_63.selection, ["X4P_5P_6P"]).asEquality("PS_Standard") }} && {{ column(Top_Customer_55.selection, ["Top_Customer"]).asEquality("Top_Customer") }} && {{ column(Customer_32.selection, ["Customer"]).asEquality("Customer") }} && {{ column(Local_Outlet_Name_51.selection, ["Local_Outlet_Name"]).asEquality("Outlet_Name") }} && {{ column(Channel_28.selection, ["Channel"]).asEquality("Channel") }} && {{ column(Subchannel_29.selection, ["Subchannel"]).asEquality("Subchannel") }} && {{ column(Store_type_49.selection, ["Store_type"]).asEquality("Store_Type") }} && {{ column(Sales_region_47.selection, ["Sales_region"]).asEquality("Sales_Region") }} && {{ column(Sales_area_25.selection, ["Sales_area"]).asEquality("Sales_Area") }} && {{ column(Sales_territory_26.selection, ["Sales_territory"]).asEquality("Sales_Territory") }} && {{ column(Field_Execution_Manager_56.selection, ["Field_Execution_Manager"]).asEquality("Field_Execution_Manager") }} && {{ column(Store_Operations_Manager_58.selection, ["Store_Operations_Manager"]).asEquality("Store_Operations_Manager") }} && {{ column(Field_Sales_Manager_57.selection, ["Field_Sales_Manager"]).asEquality("Field_Sales_Manager") }} && {{ column(Product_division_53.selection, ["Product_Division"]).asEquality("Country") }} && {{ column(Product_category_54.selection, ["Product_Category"]).asEquality("Country") }} && {{ column(Product_market_67.selection, ["Product_Market"]).asEquality("Country") }} && {{ column(Product_sector_68.selection, ["Product_sector"]).asEquality("Country") }} && {{ column(Product_brand_69.selection, ["Product_brand"]).asEquality("Country") }} && {{ column(SKU_70.selection, ["SKU"]).asEquality("Country") }}; a= group a by all;redline = foreach a generate "Redline" as 'Measure', avg(Redline_Perfect_Indicator) as summary_outlet; everbilled = foreach a generate "Ever Billed" as 'Measure', avg(Ever_Billed_Perfect_Indicator) as summary_outlet; widthpack = foreach a generate "Width Pack" as 'Measure', avg(Width_Pack_Perfect_Indicator) as summary_outlet; u = group redline by all, everbilled by all, widthpack by all;u = union redline, everbilled, widthpack;

q = load "PRODUCT_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'COC' == "1"; q = filter q by 'KPI_Type' matches "OSA"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'City' in {{ selection(City_24) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_45) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_25) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_26) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_47) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_72) }} && 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_28) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_29) }} && 'Customer_Type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_30) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_7) }} &&'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_32) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_51) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_63) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_64) }} &&  'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_54) }} && 'Product_Division' in {{ selection(Product_division_53) }} && 'Product_Market' in {{ selection(Product_market_67) }} && 'Product_sector' in {{ selection(Product_sector_68) }} && 'Product_brand' in {{ selection(Product_brand_69) }} && 'SKU' in {{ selection(SKU_70) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_55) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_56) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_58) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_57) }} && 'Customer' in {{selection(CustomerMobile_KPI_Type_84)}} && 'Customer' in {{selection(CustomerMobile_7)}}; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["current month".."current month"]; q = group q by ('Product_Category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); q = foreach q generate 'Product_Category' as 'Product Category', 'SKU_ID' as 'SKU ID', 'SKU' as 'SKU', avg('Value') as 'currentOSA';

q = load "PRODUCT_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'COC' == "1"; q = filter q by 'KPI_Type' matches "OSA"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'City' in {{ selection(City_24) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_45) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_25) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_26) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_47) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_72) }} && 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_28) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_29) }} && 'Customer_Type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_30) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_7) }} &&'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_32) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_51) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_63) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_64) }} &&  'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_54) }} && 'Product_Division' in {{ selection(Product_division_53) }} && 'Product_Market' in {{ selection(Product_market_67) }} && 'Product_sector' in {{ selection(Product_sector_68) }} && 'Product_brand' in {{ selection(Product_brand_69) }} && 'SKU' in {{ selection(SKU_70) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_55) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_56) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_58) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_57) }} && 'Customer' in {{selection(CustomerMobile_KPI_Type_84)}} && 'Customer' in {{selection(CustomerMobile_7)}};; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["1 month ago".."1 month ago"]; q = group q by ('Product_Category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); q = foreach q generate 'Product_Category' as 'Product Category', 'SKU_ID' as 'SKU ID', 'SKU' as 'SKU', avg('Value') as 'lastOSA';

q = load "PRODUCT_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'COC' == "1"; q = filter q by 'KPI_Type' matches "OSA"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'City' in {{ selection(City_24) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_45) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_25) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_26) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_47) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_72) }} && 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_28) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_29) }} && 'Customer_Type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_30) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_7) }} &&'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_32) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_51) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_63) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_64) }} &&  'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_54) }} && 'Product_Division' in {{ selection(Product_division_53) }} && 'Product_Market' in {{ selection(Product_market_67) }} && 'Product_sector' in {{ selection(Product_sector_68) }} && 'Product_brand' in {{ selection(Product_brand_69) }} && 'SKU' in {{ selection(SKU_70) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_55) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_56) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_58) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_57) }} && 'Customer' in {{selection(CustomerMobile_KPI_Type_84)}} && 'Customer' in {{selection(CustomerMobile_7)}};; cur = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["current month".."current month"];last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["1 month ago".."1 month ago"]; diff = cogroup cur by ('Product_Category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU') full, last by ('Product_Category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); diff = foreach diff generate coalesce(cur::'Product_Category',last::'Product_Category') as 'Product_Category', coalesce(cur::'SKU', last::'SKU') as 'SKU', coalesce(cur::'SKU_ID', last::'SKU_ID') as 'SKU_ID', avg(cur.Value) as currentOSA, avg(last.OSA) as lastOSA, (case when avg(cur.Value) is null then coalesce(0-avg(last.Value), 999) else coalesce(avg(cur.Value)-avg(last.Value),999) end) as 'OSAAverage';diff = foreach diff generate Product_Category as 'Product_Category', SKU_ID as 'SKU_ID', SKU as 'SKU', 'currentOSA', 'lastOSA', (case when OSAAverage != 999 then OSAAverage when currentOSA is null then (-lastOSA) else (currentOSA) end) as Percent_Diff;

q = load "PRODUCT_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'COC' == "1"; q = filter q by 'KPI_Type' matches "OSA"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'City' in {{ selection(City_24) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_45) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_25) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_26) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_47) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_72) }} && 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_28) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_29) }} && 'Customer_Type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_30) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_7) }} &&'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_32) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_51) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_63) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_64) }} &&  'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_54) }} && 'Product_Division' in {{ selection(Product_division_53) }} && 'Product_Market' in {{ selection(Product_market_67) }} && 'Product_sector' in {{ selection(Product_sector_68) }} && 'Product_brand' in {{ selection(Product_brand_69) }} && 'SKU' in {{ selection(SKU_70) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_55) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_56) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_58) }} && 'Customer' in {{selection(CustomerMobile_KPI_Type_84)}} && 'Customer' in {{selection(CustomerMobile_7)}} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_57) }}; cur = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["current month".."current month"];last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["1 month ago".."1 month ago"]; diff = cogroup cur by ('Product_Category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU') full, last by ('Product_Category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); diff = foreach diff generate coalesce(cur::'Product_Category',last::'Product_Category') as 'Product_Category', coalesce(cur::'SKU', last::'SKU') as 'SKU', coalesce(cur::'SKU_ID', last::'SKU_ID') as 'SKU_ID', coalesce(avg(cur.Value)-avg(last.Value),Value) as 'OSAAverage', avg(cur.Value) as currentOSA, avg(last.Value) as lastOSA; diff = foreach diff generate Product_Category as 'Product_Category', SKU_ID as 'SKU_ID', SKU as 'SKU', 'currentOSA', 'lastOSA', (case when OSAAverage != 999 then OSAAverage when currentOSA is null then (-lastOSA) else (currentOSA) end) as short_Bar;

by all; diff = foreach diff generate (avg(q_A.'Product_Compliance'))- coalesce(avg(q_B.'Product_Compliance_LV'),0) as 'Percent_Diff', (case when (avg(q_A.'Product_Compliance'))-coalesce(avg(q_B.'Product_Compliance_LV'),0) < 0.5 then "#EE0A50" when (avg(q_A.'Product_Compliance'))- coalesce(avg(q_B.'Product_Compliance_LV'),0) < 0.7 then cur = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["current month".."current month"];last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["1 month ago".."1 month ago"]; diff = cogroup cur by ('Product_Category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU') full, last by ('Product_Category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); diff = foreach diff generate coalesce(cur::'Product_Category',last::'Product_Category') as 'Product_Category', coalesce(cur::'SKU', last::'SKU') as 'SKU', coalesce(cur::'SKU_ID', last::'SKU_ID') as 'SKU_ID', avg(cur.Value) as currentOSA, avg(last.OSA) as lastOSA, (case when avg(cur.Value) is null then coalesce(0-avg(last.Value), 999) else coalesce(avg(cur.Value)-avg(last.Value),999) end) as 'OSAAverage';diff = foreach diff generate Product_Category as 'Product_Category', SKU_ID as 'SKU_ID', SKU as 'SKU', 'currentOSA', 'lastOSA', (case when OSAAverage != 999 then OSAAverage when currentOSA is null then (-lastOSA) else (currentOSA) end) as Percent_Diff;

q = load "PRODUCT_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'KPI_Type' matches "OSA"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'City' in {{ selection(City_24) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_45) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_25) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_26) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_47) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_72) }} && 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_28) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_29) }} && 'Customer_Type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_30) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_7) }} &&'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_32) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_51) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_63) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_64) }} &&  'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_54) }} && 'Product_Division' in {{ selection(Product_division_53) }} && 'Product_Market' in {{ selection(Product_market_67) }} && 'Product_sector' in {{ selection(Product_sector_68) }} && 'Product_brand' in {{ selection(Product_brand_69) }} && 'SKU' in {{ selection(SKU_70) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_55) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_56) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_58) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_57) }} && 'Customer' in {{selection(CustomerMobile_KPI_Type_84)}} && 'Customer' in {{selection(CustomerMobile_7)}}; cur = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["current month".."current month"];last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["1 month ago".."1 month ago"]; diff = cogroup cur by ('Product_Category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU') full, last by ('Product_Category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); diff = foreach diff generate coalesce(cur::'Product_Category',last::'Product_Category') as 'Product_Category', coalesce(cur::'SKU', last::'SKU') as 'SKU', coalesce(cur::'SKU_ID', last::'SKU_ID') as 'SKU_ID', coalesce(avg(cur.Value)-avg(last.Value),Value) as 'OSAAverage', avg(cur.Value) as currentOSA, avg(last.Value) as lastOSA; diff = foreach diff generate Product_Category as 'Product_Category', SKU_ID as 'SKU_ID', SKU as 'SKU', 'currentOSA', 'lastOSA', (case when OSAAverage != 999 then OSAAverage when currentOSA is null then (-lastOSA) else (currentOSA) end) as short_Bar;

q = load "PRODUCT_SCORE"; q= filter q by 'Top_Customer' == "Yes"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'City' in {{ selection(City_24) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_45) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_25) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_26) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_47) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_72) }} && 'Customer_Type' in {{selection(Customer_type_30)}} && 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_28) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_29) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_51) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_63) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_64) }} &&  'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_54) }} && 'Product_Division' in {{ selection(Product_division_53) }} && 'Product_Market' in {{ selection(Product_market_67) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_56) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_58) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_57) }} && 'Store_Type' in {{selection(Store_type_49)}} && 'Sales_area' in {{selection(Sales_area_25) }} &&  'Product_Division' in {{selection(Product_division_53)}}; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in {{selection(Date_Year_Date_Month_14)}}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{selection(CustomerMobile_7)}}; q = group q by ('Customer', 'KPI_Type'); q = foreach q generate 'Customer' as 'Customer', 'KPI_Type' as 'KPI_Type' ,avg(Value) as 'null';
q = load "PRODUCT_SCORE"; q = group q by ('Country', 'KPI_Type'); q = foreach q generate q.'Country' as 'Country', q.'KPI_Type' as 'KPI_Type', avg('Value') as 'avg_Score';

["Sales_region"]).asEquality("Sales_region") }} && {{ column(Sales_area_25.selection, ["Sales_area"]).asEquality("Sales_area") }} && {{ column(Sales_territory_26.selection, avg('OSA_Compliance') as 'Percent_Diff', (case when avg('OSA_Compliance')  < 0.5 then "#EE0A50" when avg('OSA_Compliance')  < 0.7 then "#F8CE00" else "#0FD178" end) as 'color';

q = load "PRODUCT_COMPLIANCE"; q= filter q by 'Top_Customer' == "Yes"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'City' in {{ selection(City_24) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_45) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_25) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_26) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_47) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_72) }} && 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_28) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_29) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_51) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_63) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_64) }} &&  'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_54) }} && 'Product_Division' in {{ selection(Product_division_53) }} && 'Product_Market' in {{ selection(Product_market_67) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_56) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_58) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_57) }};q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in {{selection(Date_Year_Date_Month_14)}}; q = group q by 'Customer'; q = foreach q generate 'Customer' as 'Customer', avg(OSA_Compliance) as OSACompliance; q = order q by 'OSACompliance' desc;

parameters.text: This chart displays the IQ KPIs for Product which will represent the KPIs required for 4P Stores.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Product compliant for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart lists all the audited COTC SKUs in the country, the % of enrolled stores that they were available in the latest month, and the variance in availability from the previous month.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in the enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country in the latest month.
This chart lists all the audited MH SKUs in the country, the % of enrolled stores that they were available in the latest month, and the variance in availability from the previous month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Product compliant across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Product compliant for the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MT enrolled stores that were Product compliant across all the Product categories in the country in the latest month.
This chart lists all the audited MH SKUs in the country, the % of enrolled stores that they were available in the latest month, and the variance in availability from the previous month.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in the enrolled stores for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart lists all the audited COTC SKUs in the country, the % of enrolled stores that they were available in the latest month, and the variance in availability from the previous month.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in the enrolled stores for a country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in the enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in the enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in the enrolled stores across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in enrolled stores in different sales regions of the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in 4P, 5P and 6P stores in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country which were Product Compliant in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in the enrolled stores across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of 4P, 5P and 6P stores that were Product compliant for the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Product compliant across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MT enrolled stores that were Product compliant across all the Product categories in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Product compliant in different sales regions of the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of 4P, 5P and 6P stores that were Product compliant for the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in the enrolled stores for a country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Product compliant in different sales regions of the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Product compliant for the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in the enrolled stores for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in 4P, 5P and 6P stores in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Product compliant for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in enrolled stores in different sales regions of the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MH SKUs that were OSA, OOS and VOID in MT enrolled stores across all the Product categories in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country which were Product Compliant in the latest month.
